name: Sam Breadner
coverLetter: I have been working with marijuana for 7 years now.  I spent the last few seasons trimming in Colorado and southern Oregon.  I spent last year working in the propagation/mother room department for Phat Panda, an I502 out of Washington.  I am looking for full-time work and overtime if need be,  I can start as soon as possible and I can be mobile or live on site if need be.
